item.title: Democratic governors testify before House GOP panel about immigration policy
item.description: The hearing comes amid immigration enforcement protests in California.

item.title: Senate Democrats seek probe of Ed Martin's early actions at DOJ
item.description: Senate Judiciary Democrats are pushing for an investigation into Ed Martin's early tenure at the Justice Department.

item.title: David Hogg splits from DNC in 'fundamental disagreement' over vice chair's role
item.description: He stepped down as vice chair ahead of Democratic Party elections Thursday.
